response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal, as it's only $500 more than what John, another interested party, is willing to pay for the same product. Don't miss out on this chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reasonable price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
